name: dawarich
description: Dawarich is a self-hosted travel tracker that visualizes trips and visited places on an interactive world map. It supports multiple trips, photos, tags, and timeframes, making it ideal for travelers to document their adventures privately.

features.title: Travel Visualization
features.description: Display trips on interactive world maps. See your adventures come to life

features.title: Photo Integration
features.description: Attach photos to locations and trips. Visual travel memories

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Manage multiple journeys with tags and timeframes. Structured travel history

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep your travel data on your own server. No third-party tracking

features.title: Timeline View
features.description: Browse your travels chronologically. Relive your journey

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your travel documentation. Your adventures, your data
